message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a price of $20,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but $19,000 is my bottom line. This offer reflects the true value of the product.  Take it or leave it.
